sourceId.description: During the 'RECEIVE' event, sourceId indicates where orderables are received from. Can not be present along with destination id.

quantity.description: The quantity of the orderable or the stock on hand in 'ADJUSTMENT' event. Can not be negative number.

facilityId.description: Part of identifier of stock card. Indicates in which facility this event occurred.

destinationId.description: During the 'ISSUE' event, destinationId indicates where orderables are issued to. Can not be present along with source id.

destinationFreeText.description: Remark of the destination. Only allowed when destination id is present and destination id does not point to a facility in ref-data.

reasonId.description: Allowed for 'ISSUE', 'RECEIVE' and 'ADJUSTMENT' events, not allowed for 'PHYSICAL INVENTORY' events.

orderableId.description: Part of identifier of stock card. Indicates which orderable this event is regarding.

reasonFreeText.description: Remark of reason. Only allowed when reason id is present and the reason is configured by implementer or admin to allow free text.

sourceFreeText.description: Remark of the source. Only allowed when source id is present and source id does not point to a facility in ref-data.

programId.description: Part of identifier of stock card. Indicates under which program the target stock card is.

occurredDate.description: The date and time(including time zone) when this event occurred
